node.title: Meet Australia's first police squad going after abusive officers
node.alt: Eight people stand outside a house and fence.
node.description: A groundbreaking initiative aimed at holding abusive police employees to account comes ahead of an expected spike in reports and prosecutions over family violence.
node.content:
["In an Australian first, Victoria Police has launched a\u00a0specialist unit to investigate serious cases of family violence involving its employees.", "The employee-related family violence team is based within an existing unit,\u00a0the professional standards command, which promotes high ethical standards in the force and deals with complaints.", "Six officers began work with the unit on Tuesday, with the remaining five due to join in January.", "As well as investigating \"the most serious and complex\" allegations, the team will oversee all family violence cases involving officers\u00a0across the state.", "Assistant Commissioner of Professional Standards Command (PSC) Tess Walsh hopes the groundbreaking reforms will\u00a0give victims the confidence to report to police.", "\"We want to provide a safe, supportive environment for victims from go to whoa,\" she told ABC Radio Melbourne.", "\"We are extremely sorry about those [past cases] where we haven't met the mark.", "", "
Assistant Commissioner Walsh\u00a0is \"proud\" that Victoria Police\u00a0has taken a leadership role on the issue of family violence.(ABC: Matilda Marozzi)
", "
'A difficult subject'
", "Assistant Commissioner Walsh said she was\u00a0proud that the force had \"put itself in a position to be a bit vulnerable, but to be a bit better\".\u00a0", "\"It's a difficult subject, but it's something that I think we need expertise in,\" she said.", "The employee-related family violence team was announced in May 2021, after the Royal Commission into Family Violence recommended the PSC review Victoria Police's policies and procedures relating to family violence involving employees.", "In November, Victoria Police launched a standalone policy on\u00a0family violence involving employees\u00a0and the organisation has been rolling out specialist training\u00a0for members\u00a0across the state.", "If the unit is successful, Assistant Commissioner Walsh says\u00a0it would\u00a0receive\u00a0all reports relating to abusive officers.", "\"We genuinely are committed to holding offenders to account and whether they're police members, former police members, it matters not.\"", "
'They've listened. They actually get it'
", "As part of the reforms, Taskforce Salus \u2014\u00a0set up in 2014 to investigate allegations of sexual harassment or assault against current and former Victoria Police personnel\u00a0\u2014 has been renamed the sexual offences and family violence unit (SOFVU).", "The SOFVU will investigate current and historical sexual offences, as well as family violence, alleged to have been committed by or against\u00a0a Victoria Police employee.", "The employee-related family violence team is one part of SOFVU.", "A victim of\u00a0family violence, Michelle*, told the ABC about extensive failures in Victoria Police's investigation of her former partner, who was a police officer.", "In 2020, her abuser pleaded guilty to six consolidated charges and was sentenced on appeal in the County Court to a community corrections order, which is due to expire next year.", "Michelle is currently suing Victoria Police in the Supreme Court of Victoria over their handling of her case.", "Despite problems with her investigation, Michelle says she has confidence in the new team.", "\"Victoria Police has\u00a0to be applauded for setting up this new unit,\" she said,", "
Funding concerns
", "The fact the team's nine specialist detectives and two witness support sergeants will only investigate the most serious cases of family violence involving police employees worries Michelle.", "Most matters will be dealt with at a regional level, with the SOFVU\u00a0on call to assist local detectives.", "\"My concern is that they don't have enough funding, because in my view all alleged family violence involving police employees is high risk,\" she said.", "\"I'm worried that in cases like mine, where some of the less serious offences were reported up-front, these cases may not be picked up by this unit.\"", "Assistant Commissioner Walsh said improved training across the state gives her confidence local detectives will refer complex cases.", "\"We've got a family violence training officer in every one of the 21 divisions across the state, and then you've got the really highly qualified\u00a0family violence investigation units,\" she said.", "\"What [SOFVU is] really looking at is\u00a0the top tier, the higher-risk offending and the serious repeat offending that our people will be picking up as investigations.", "\"So, the need for the specialist group isn't everywhere. Where it is, we'll pick up those jobs.\"", "", "
The new team has undergone extensive training to effectively support victims and hold abusive employees to account.(ABC: Matilda Marozzi)
", "
Support available for all
", "Michelle is also worried about potential conflicts of interest\u00a0in regional areas, where the distances between divisions may mean it is not \"practicable\" to have an investigator from a different division to the alleged perpetrator.", "Even if some investigations are undertaken within a regional division, Assistant Commissioner Walsh said\u00a0she is confident conflicts of interest can be managed.", "Family violence involving officers is a widespread problem.\u00a0Assistant Commissioner Walsh said\u00a0Victoria Police's initiative had\u00a0already attracted interest from colleagues\u00a0interstate and in New Zealand.", "Victoria Police said\u00a0specialist support is available for anyone who wishes to make a report about a police employee through the\u00a0Sexual Offence and Family Violence Unit on 03 8335 6700.", "To help victims of family violence and sexual assault make decisions about reporting, Victoria Police has\u00a0also published a detailed guide with information about reporting options and available support.", "*Names has been changed for legal reasons."]
